评论详情: Just like the head line says this product is definitely not accurate to the pictures shown. Maybe its my fault for not reading descriptions better but I am highly disappointed. The product is made from a cheap fabric that has the design from the pictures basically printed on to make it look older and worn out but it looks so bad. There is also like fake sleeves that are a whole different material and even that material is better than the rest of the shirt. Also in the picture the background of the shirt is black but the shirt that arrived has this blueish color. anyways, don't make the same mistake I did by expecting something better. Really disappointed.
I like it, the design is cool and the texture is silky but it fits kind of small on me. Even though it says “women size” I figured it could be unisex. If you want a baggy feel, definitely size up
